response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business or personal endeavors. This product, valued at over $1,000,000 to us, represents years of research, innovation, and dedication by our team. We are confident it can provide substantial value to you, tailored to meet your specific needs and goals.

To make this opportunity accessible, we are offering the product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special offer designed to reward early adopters and maximize the potential benefits for both parties. Accepting this offer would not only secure your access to the product but also potentially unlock additional resources or support from our team to ensure its successful integration into your operations or lifestyle.

Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or exploring how this product can be the key to unlocking new possibilities for you. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
